fields.name: LineBehaviour
fields.description:
$[*Listing,Filter,Link] $help[Select how you want this component to behave.
Listing: Default behavior
Link: Every line uses a custom link and redirects upon clicking.
Filter: allows the specification of a var and its value to be used across components in the dashboard.]

args:
Select how you want this component to behave.
Listing: Default behavior
Link: Every line uses a custom link and redirects upon clicking.
Filter: allows the specification of a var and its value to be used across components in the dashboard.

Select the defaults to change

fields.name: MaxVisibleDayEvents
fields.description: $number(0) Specify the maximum number of events that will be visible before enabling the +more link. Set to -1 to list all events. Defaults to 3.

configuration.description: Specify the maximum number of events that will be visible before enabling the +more link. Set to -1 to list all events. Defaults to 3.

fields.description: List of views to show (first is default). Example: dayGridWeek,dayGridMonth,listMonth

fields.name: OutputVarInterval
fields.description: $help[You can specify a name for a variable where the Calendar will insert two properties: startDate and endDate - respectively containing the current calendar's period's start and end dates in milliseconds]

fields.description: $text Name of the definition field to use as the event description

fields.name: StateEventField
fields.description: 'Name of the field to calculate the color for the event. If not defined it will use always the same color for all events. If starts with "#" that hex color will be used. If starts with "bg:" then it'll fill the background of that day with the color.'

configuration.description: 'Name of the field to calculate the color for the event. If not defined it will use always the same color for all events. If starts with "#" that hex color will be used. If starts with "bg:" then it'll fill the background of that day with the color.'

fields.name: EventsQuery
fields.description: Define a query to restrict the results that will appear in the calendar. Defaults to all records in the definition

configuration.description: Define a query to restrict the results that will appear in the calendar. Defaults to all records in the definition

fields.description: $[True,*False] True if events occupy all day. False if otherwise.
